meanings.definition: The upper part of a guitar or other stringed instrument that supports the tuning pegs.
meanings.sent1: The headstocks of the guitar keep the tuning pegs in place.
meanings.sent2: She carefully adjusted the strings on the headstocks of her ukulele.
meanings.sent3: The headstocks of the banjo decided to have a party for the tuning pegs.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a whirlwind, each thought a tuning peg on the headstocks of his guitar.
meanings.sent5: The headstocks, like sentinels, guarded the tuning pegs with unwavering dedication.

meanings.definition: A device on a lathe that holds and rotates the workpiece.
meanings.sent1: The headstocks on the lathe securely grip the workpiece for turning.
meanings.sent2: The machinist adjusted the speed of the lathe's headstocks for precision.
meanings.sent3: The headstocks on the lathe decided to take a spin with the workpiece.
meanings.sent4: The headstocks on the lathe were like dancers, gracefully rotating the workpiece.
meanings.sent5: The headstocks on the lathe hummed with power as they turned the workpiece.
